element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: Creates a new points layer with the centroids of the features in a given layer. In case of lines, the centroid is the center point. In the case of points, the point itself is the centroid.

element.name: RESULT
element.text: The centroids. The attributes table associated with this layer is the same as the one of the input layer. Each centroid has the sames attributes as the input geometry it was calculated from.
